nodes.text: The Light Bending BARC Speeder was a variant of the BARC speeder that was utilized by various individuals during the height of the Galactic Empire.

It was a one-person, modified repulsorlift speederbike once used by specialized Biker Advanced Recon Commandos to go on highly dangerous missions during the Clone Wars. This particular speeder bent the light around it to add a shimmering, ghostly effect.
This vehicle is given out to players of Star Wars Galaxies who redeem 'Buddy Tokens.' These tokens are awarded for inviting people to play Star Wars Galaxies.
